name: Rüzgar Hipostazı
desc:
Code name: Beth. A high-purity Anemo entity.
Elemental hypostases are life forms which have completely abandoned their former appearance and biological structure, making them able to reach the highest level of elemental purity.
Research into hypostases is mainly led by scholars of Sumeru Academia, but due to the level of danger that they pose, little of substance is known about hypostases beyond their scientific name and code name.

dropMaterial.name: Kasırga Tohumu
dropMaterial.desc:
The imploded form of an Anemo Hypostasis upon its defeat.
Contains the essence of Anemo energy.
It is said that the power to create hurricanes resides within its seemingly fragile body. This butterfly of pure Anemo energy must surely be waiting for the day when it can conjure up storms once again.

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turkuazı Kırıntısı
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turkuazı Parçası
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turkuazı Külçesi
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

value.text: Elemental creatures who protect themselves from incoming attack with their durable shell. Find an opportune moment to land a blow to their <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> . They are able to control their <color=#ffe14b>elemental orb</color> in fights and restore their health when they feel threatened. If you fail to utilize the upcurrents to absorb these orbs, the battle will be significantly harder.
